      public APIInformationApi.GetApiVersionAdapter getApiVersion(Optional<String> xRequestID)
      Returns the ingestion service software's version information.

      Path: /version

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : ApiVersionResponse (The HTTP request was successful.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      xRequestID - The uuid string user can provide for tracing purpose.

    • getHealth

      public APIInformationApi.GetHealthAdapter getHealth(Optional<String> xRequestID)
      Returns the health status of the Search ingestion service.

      Path: /health

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : ServiceHealthResponse (The HTTP request was successful.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : UnauthorizedError (The HAPI Gateway has returned an unauthorized authentication error.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 503 : Error (The server is currently unavailable.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      xRequestID - The uuid string user can provide for tracing purpose.
